description: Their ENG quality is a 50/50 mix of Merino and Lyocell fibers from TENCEL. Lyocell fibers are derived from sustainable wood sources, in sustainably managed forests. Wood and pulp used by the Lenzing Group is harvested from certified and controlled sources. This ENG Polo Shirt has contrast details inside the collar and buttoning tab. Wear it in the same way as your favorite basic tee: with tailoring and jeans alike.
name: We Norwegians Eng Detail Polo - Mens
